title: Topic 005 Question 045
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains as Azure key vault and an Azure Storage account. The key vault contains customer-managed keys. The storage account is configured to use the customer-managed keys stored in the key vault.
You plan to store data in Azure by using the following services:
Which two services support data encryption by using the keys stored in the key vault? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
